==  Shell CMDs ==

List all declared variables in ZSH: `( setopt posixbuiltin; set; ) | less`

=== Drag Window on with Key Press OSX ===

Drag windows while holding cmd + ^ on OSX:

{{{shell
  defaults write -g NSWindowShouldDragOnGesture -bool true
}}}
